channel.title: RuneScape Mod Room?
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Za6BFmNEDcU I just found out while doing a little research on the RuneScape mods and stumbled across some rumours about a mod room where they have all there meetings and what not. So I looked it up on youtube and found the video above recorded by a real p mod
Jagex staff has refused to reveal the location of the Player Moderator room, and has refused to reveal where it is accessed by Player Moderators at. I've edited a sentence containing information revealing this, as it is not officially recognized by Jagex, and it can lead to issues with players waiting near the location and harassing Player Moderators. Star Find 23:57, February 24, 2010 (UTC)

@im_hard wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Mod Room?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

I’ve got some mod friends on rs, i watched that vid, and pm’d him, i said can i ask you a question he said sure i’ll try to answer it. I asked about the mod room, like 4 pm’s of it and he never replied, i suppose they are not suppose to tell and he was ignoring me cause i asked.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Mod Room?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:360518”][quote author=Spades link=topic=456834.msg3343853#msg3343853 date=1284659276]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=456834.msg3343846#msg3343846 date=1284658925]

Mod room is, or was, accessed by talking to the Lumbridge Guide. I think they replaced him with the Lumbridge Sage though, so I presume they moved the teleport functionality to the Sage npc as well.

Obviously the dialogue between the player’s avatar and the Lumbridge sage isn’t viewable by non pmods. But yeah, that’s the point of access.
The room is only accessible when one of the players inside is a jagex mod. If a player departs and that player just so happens to be the last jagex mod in the room, everyone (ie, all pmods) is kicked from the room and teleported back to Lumbridge.

Also noteworthy, nothing is doable in the pmod room – you can’t cast any spells, perform any experience gaining actions, etc.
[/quote]That’s interesting.
What’s your source? Were you a pmod, or did you just read this/talk to a pmod.

I’ve heard this/seen this from a-couple different people. If you go to the RuneScape site it says something about it. But I had a friend who hacked his friend who happen to be a player mod and went to one of the Jagex Meetings, he recorded it and sent it to me.
[/quote]What type of stuff would JMods talk about with PMods?[/quote]

Mostly updates and such.

The person who made that youtube video was probably demoted after, lol.

Read full topic

The room is only accessible when one of the players inside is a jagex mod. If a player departs and that player just so happens to be the last jagex mod in the room, everyone (ie, all pmods) is kicked from the room and teleported back to Lumbridge.

Also noteworthy, nothing is doable in the pmod room – you can’t cast any spells, perform any experience gaining actions, etc.
[/quote]That’s interesting.
What’s your source? Were you a pmod, or did you just read this/talk to a pmod.

Mod room is, or was, accessed by talking to the Lumbridge Guide. I think they replaced him with the Lumbridge Sage though, so I presume they moved the teleport functionality to the Sage npc as well.

Obviously the dialogue between the player’s avatar and the Lumbridge sage isn’t viewable by non pmods. But yeah, that’s the point of access.
The room is only accessible when one of the players inside is a jagex mod. If a player departs and that player just so happens to be the last jagex mod in the room, everyone (ie, all pmods) is kicked from the room and teleported back to Lumbridge.

[quote=“Lothy, post:6, topic:360518”]Mod room is, or was, accessed by talking to the Lumbridge Guide. I think they replaced him with the Lumbridge Sage though, so I presume they moved the teleport functionality to the Sage npc as well.

Obviously the dialogue between the player’s avatar and the Lumbridge sage isn’t viewable by non pmods. But yeah, that’s the point of access.
The room is only accessible when one of the players inside is a jagex mod. If a player departs and that player just so happens to be the last jagex mod in the room, everyone (ie, all pmods) is kicked from the room and teleported back to Lumbridge.

Also noteworthy, nothing is doable in the pmod room – you can’t cast any spells, perform any experience gaining actions, etc.[/quote]That’s interesting.

item.title: RuneScape Mod Room?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Mod room is, or was, accessed by talking to the Lumbridge Guide. I think they replaced him with the Lumbridge Sage though, so I presume they moved the teleport functionality to the Sage npc as well.

Obviously the dialogue between the player’s avatar and the Lumbridge sage isn’t viewable by non pmods. But yeah, that’s the point of access.
The room is only accessible when one of the players inside is a jagex mod. If a player departs and that player just so happens to be the last jagex mod in the room, everyone (ie, all pmods) is kicked from the room and teleported back to Lumbridge.

Also noteworthy, nothing is doable in the pmod room – you can’t cast any spells, perform any experience gaining actions, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Mod Room?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

There is a picture of the Mod Room on RuneScapes site, if you look hard enough you will find it. It just loooks like the room underneath Varrock Bank. With everything removed including some walls they left some tables and chairs but otherwise it is a pointless room.

Read full topic
